name: Steven Testa

certifications: Microsoft Certified Technology Specialist (MCTS): Web Applications Programming in .NET 4

experience.jobTitle: Senior Applications Developer - Web Experience Team
remarks: Created a new company intranet and extranet, leveraging the Telligent Evolution platform. Delivered a new social enterprise platform to connect employees, resellers and customers in an unprecedented way.
Build end-to-end custom solutions on top of our platform to facilitate
Software develpment using C#, .NET (1.1, 2.0 3.5), Perl and C++
Development of a wide range of products including: HL7 systems integrations, communications utilities, custome Scantron OMP programs and ANS 835/837 billing utilities.
Software was developed for multiple operating systems including several versions of Windows, SCO Unix and Linux.
Other responsibilities included: primary support contact, documentation composition and internal product testing.
Focused on website creation for external clients across a variety of businesses.
Web page design using HTML, XHTML and CSS. Adhered to HTML and XHTML String W3C standards.
Development of dynmaic content web pages using ASP.NET and C#
Graduated with Highest Honors with a final GPA of 3.86 and a degree in Software Applications Programming. Courses of study included C#, C++, Complex Data Structures, Architectural Patterns and more.

Began my college studies at Cleveland State University in the Computer Engineering department. While at CSU I studied classic Computer Science related topics including: Calculus, Set Theory and C++ before eventually transferring to ITT.
